name: RenjaRacing I
description:
Welcome RenjaRacing1.  A retro racing game similar to the SNES Super Mario Kart. It's a mix of 2D billboard sprites and a 3D world (the tracks).

Race in 2 different maps against 5 other players (bots only at the moment). There are 10 unique characters to choose and play with. Power-ups and coins are available during the races.

Controls:

  • W = Accelerate
  • S = Decelerate
  • A = Steer Left
  • D = Steer Right
  • Space bar = the brake
  • E = the ability button (use this for the banana power-up)

We hope you enjoy the game :D

By aZamBie and Xip (Xiphactinus27)
